resources.string: Use custom application instead of the recent applications dialog
Drag the slider to targets to assign shortcuts
View or change custom lock screen shortcuts
Lock screen shortcuts reset to default
Delete all user created lock screen shortcuts and restore to default?
Select or change the desired application or activity and the associated icon
Set whether the lockscreen challenge (circle, pattern, pin) is minimized when the screen is turned on.
Show the notification text around the ring.
Show all notifications including ongoing, non-clearable notifications.
Hide low priority notifications such as those from Google Now.
Show active display notifications when you take the device out of your pocket.
Excluded applications will not show up in active display.
Invert the colors when in areas with bright light such as direct sunlight.
Brightness level for displaying notifications when automatic brightness is not enabled.
Show the date above the clock
Show AM/PM indicator next to time when using 12hour format
View or change the displayed buttons
View or change the order of the buttons
View or change the Brightness button modes
View or change the Sound button modes
View or change lock screen button actions
This will filter your current statusbar system icon to your preferred color
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Show shortcuts in the notification drawer
Select or change the desired application or icon
The number of shortcuts to display
Colorize the stock and/or application shortcut icons
Colorizes any application icons with the chosen icon color
Change the brightness by sliding your finger across the statusbar. Note: Will not be active when auto-brightness is on
Display the name of the currently connected Wifi network
Reset circle colors to apply installed theme engine colors
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Show player controls while music is playing
Close after removing the last notification
Close after removing the last removable notification
Remember to remove buttons if using big menu button
How and when do you want the menu buttons
Choose the number of navigation buttons
100 is 70\%% of screen width, 5 is 30\%% of screen width. 0 will default to per button width.
Navbar height while in portrait mode
System bar height while in portrait
System Bar height while in landscape
Navbar height if the bar is along left side
You should reboot right now to make sure changes occur
Please reboot for height change to be configured properly
If checked, custom icons will be colorized
Change the color of the glow
Show arrow keys in the navbar while typing
Timeout time for hidden navbar window
Timeout time for hidden systembar window
Press icon to select actions or custom icon
Do you want to reset the navigation ring?
Choose number of targets in the navigation ring
Drag your finger to targets to assign actions
Lets you choose from random, color fill or default background for tiles
Allows you to select your own random colors
Toggles are only available for the left and right swipe ribbons.
Please enter a new label. Enter an empty label to revert to stock label.
View or change how the widget will display
Set whether the hints for the left and right widgets are shown when the screen is turned on.
Unlock password/pin lockscreen without pressing enter button
Warning: Some widgets are not intended to be used on the lockscreen. Do not blame the widget maker or Carbon if your widget misbehaves. Choose responsibly!

This rambar shows how android is really using your available ram. Please note that having apps open in the background and cached helps for your device to open your apps faster. For further explanations on how android memory (RAM) managment works, please follow the help button in the menu.
Display the 3-dot overflow menu button within apps
The action overflow button may not be visible until apps are restarted
The action overflow button may not be hidden until apps are restarted
HALO will appear for incoming tasks and scroll out of sight after a while
Applies tasking or dragging to the double-tap-swipe gesture
For black/white-listing notifications pinging through HALO
Defines how big HALO is going to be
Enable custom colors for HALO instead of the default theme colors
When opening an app with HALO the underlying app will get paused (enabled by default on low memory devices)
HALO will disappear completely when empty
Show message box for incoming notifications
HALO will ping when device is unlocked if new notifications were received
Halo message box animation for incoming notifications
Controls whether you want floating windows from notification panel
Auto hide statusbar if no clearable notifications are present
Auto hide statusbar if no notifications are present
Peek at the statusbar when hidden by swiping down from top edge of screen
Press icons to select actions or delete.\nPress menu for more options.
Vibrate on touch of swipe area
Enable the app name text below the icon
You can not use swipe from bottom with NavBar enabled, must use Navbar Auto Hide or manually hide the NavBar.
With NavBar Auto Hide enabled, longpress the activation area to display ribbon.
Notification shade closes on action completion
An error occurred.\n\nPlease check for root access. To activate go into superuser settings and enable root access.
Make sure you follow the steps one-by-one and complete each one before proceeding to the next.
1. Change LCD Density to stock value
Tablets and older phones use 160. Most phones use 240. Galaxy Nexus uses 320 by default.
Come back here after the reboot and complete the rest of the steps!
This step clears data from market, google play services and google services framework.
Come back here after the reboot and complete the rest of the steps!
Press back when done to return here.
"Couldn't open the market! If you're sure it's installed, open it yourself from the launcher."
6. Change density to whatever you like!
If you ever have compatibility issues with the market, be sure to return here and repeat the process.
"Changing your LCD density can cause unexpected app behavior. If you encounter market app incompatibility please return here and restart the process from step 1."
Values higher than %1$d are not recommended
Longpressing the center of the lock ring or navigation ring will turn torch on. Release finger to turn torch off.
Access Google Now or long press to voice search
Fast Charge is not supported by the current kernel
Use 4G network icon instead of LTE
Enable custom colors for Pie instead of the default theme colors
Select the location where Pie will be placed at
Manage how animations and status additions will be handled
Adjust the angle between screen\'s edge and pie
Adjust the gap that separates pie elements
Center pie on the trigger edge
Determine the size of the triggering area that will start pie controls
Enabling will let the Notification panel and QuickSettings activate when swiped
Whether or not the menu button will appear when unneeded
If checked Pie will stay in place no matter which orientation
Allows your launcher to regain sanity after a screensize change (recommended)
View, select or change the layout of the displayed tiles
Dynamic tiles are not always visible and will only show up if triggered by a system event
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Close the Quick Settings panel upon toggle
Open Quick Settings tiles in floating window
Pulldown quick settings if no notifications are present

Pulldown quick settings if no notifications are present

Restore the default displayed tiles and layout?
Use the same tiles and layout as the Quick Settings panel
Show network speed in statusbar (Thinking Bridge)
